original: Blomberg, Kurt Ivar Fritiof, chefredaktör, UddevaMa, f. 21/12/06 i Eskilstuna av maskinist Ivar B. o. Anna Ericsson. G. 32 m. Vera Berglund. — Stud. v. Nyköpings h. a. 1. Medarb. i Södermani. Läns Tidn. 29, i Sörmlandsposten 29, platsred. f. Sörmlandsposten i Strängnäs 30, f. Södermani. Läns Tidn. i Katrineholm 31, medarb. i Katrineholms-Kuriren fr. 31, red:sekr. 42, andre red. 44, redxhef o. andre red. i Bohusläningen i Uddevalla 46, chefred, o. ■ansv. utg. av Bohusläningen sed. 46. Sign.: Cif. Led. av kyrkofullm. i Katrineholm, ordf. i folkpart. ungd:-förb. i Katrineh., sekr. i hyresgäst-fören., hyresndn o. Barnens dag i Katrineh. Medl. av Publ:kl. sed. 33 o. av Sv. journ:fören.
translated: Blomberg, Kurt Ivar Fritiof, editor-in-chief, Uddevalla, b. December 21, 1906 in Eskilstuna to machinist Ivar B. and Anna Ericsson. Married in 1932 to Vera Berglund. — Studied at Nyköping high school. Worked at Södermani Läns Tidning in 1929, Sörmlandsposten in 1929, became local editor for Sörmlandsposten in Strängnäs in 1930, worked at Södermani Läns Tidning in Katrineholm in 1931, worked for Katrineholms-Kuriren from 1931, became secretary in 1942, assistant editor in 1944, editor-in-chief and deputy editor at Bohusläningen in Uddevalla in 1946, and editor and responsible publisher of Bohusläningen since 1946. Known by the initials "Cif." Member of the church council in Katrineholm, chairman of the young people's association of the People's Party in Katrineholm, secretary of the tenants' association, rental board and Children's Day in Katrineholm. Member of the Publicists' Club since 1933 and the Swedish Journalist Association.

memberOf.name: Young People's Association of the People's Party in Katrineholm
